title: Ask HN: Returning to a Previous Job
text:
I screwed up by leaving a cushy big tech job for a start-up five months after starting. This was eight months ago.

Basically, I'm wondering if I have to interview again, or if they'll just take me back. Has anyone gone through the process of going back to a previous big corporate employer?

Ask HN: Google Maps alternatives that uses OSM and has a review feature
text:
Several months ago, there is a similar question here https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=29774603. But, what I am looking for is a Google Maps alternative that :

- is based on OSM

- has a review feature like Google Maps

- is not tied to a company

- is open source (optional)

Privacy Friendly Smart Doorbell
text: I was hoping someone could direct me to a privacy friendly smart doorbell. I read here on Hacker News that Amazon often shares our videos without our consent so I'm hoping to replace ours with one that respects our property rights or better, a device that allows me to manage my own video collection, encrypted on a cloud provider.
